text:
. Richard B. Hull
-2-
June 20, 1958
I assume, however, you do wish some indication of
the degree of Fund interest in this, so far as grant
support is concerned. Here again, I must tell you
that the Fund is not prepared to support such a
project at this time.
With best wishes,
Sincerely,
Lester Wâ€ž Nelson
Assistant Vice President
